General.Name: Rathdowney Resources Ltd
General.Description: Rathdowney Resources Ltd. acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. Its flagship project is its 100% owned the Olza zinc-lead-silver project covering an area of approximately 100 square kilometers located in the Upper Silesian Mineral district in southwestern Poland. Rathdowney Resources Ltd. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1040 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4H1
